full_summary:
# Vector Network Analyzers (or Equivalent) Tender Announcement

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** cb-323-84331908
* **Solicitation Number:** 202402387
* **Publication Date:** 2023-10-04
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-18T14:00:00
* **Amendment Number:** 7
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-11-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31

## Tender Specifications

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified bidders to submit proposals for the procurement of two (2) Vector Network Analyzers or equivalent. The required specifications include:

* Two (2) Vector Network Analyzers with two (2) ports 5 kHz to 3 GHz and N(f) connectors
* Two (2) options that add functionalities to the R&S ZNL3 with a spectrum analysis function up to 3 GHz
* Two (2) DC Power supply for 12/24 V supply voltage
* Two (2) Li-Ion battery packs for internal battery slot
* Two (2) Distance to Fault Measurements for R&S ZNL
* Two (2) Transport bags for R&S FPL1000 and R&S ZNL/R&S ZNLE
* Two (2) H-style shoulder harness for R&S FPL1000 and R&S ZNL
* Two (2) Spare battery packs for R&S FPL1000 and R&S ZNL
* Two (2) RF cables 50 Ohm; N(m) to N(m); DC to 18GHz
* Two (2) Calibration Units 50 Ohms 5 kHz to 6 GHz, 2 ports, N (f)
* Two (2) Calibration Units 50 Ohms 2 MHz to 4 GHz, 1-port, N (m)

## Tender Requirements

* The tender is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under supply arrangement E60HN-16ELEC/XXX/HN qualified under Stream 2: Electronic Products.
* All products must be delivered on or before March 31, 2024.
* The basis of selection is Lowest Price, Compliant Bidder.

## Contact Information

* Name: Olivia McCarthy
* Email: olivia.mccarthy@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 574-7219
